title: "Advanced techniques in text analysis with R"

-   10:30 am - 11:00 am: Break.

-   12:00 pm - 1:00 pm: Lunch.

-   2:00 pm - 3:00 pm: Laboratory with real-world data sets.

-   3:00 pm - 3:30 pm: Coffee Break.

-   3:30 pm - 4:30 pm: Overview of other text analysis techniques, with hands-on exercises.

-   4:30 pm - 5:00 pm: Conclusion and wrap-up of the seminar.
